results.p: Dodgeball is a team sport in which players on two opposing teams try to throw balls and hit opponents while avoiding being hit themselves.

Dodgeball is a team game in which players must dodge or catch balls thrown by the opposition whilst attempting to strike their opponents in the same way.
Dodgeball was originally played in Africa over two hundred years ago, but instead of the fun, jocular game that it is today, it was in fact a deadly game.
Aug 22, 2024 — The meaning of DODGEBALL is a game in which players stand in a circle and try to hit opponents within the circle with a large inflated ball.
